_package_info.description: Character backgrounds for dystopian cyberpunk futures featuring corporate wage slaves, street hackers, augmented mercenaries, and underground rebels
_package_info.author: Storymaster

background.name: Corporate Executive
background.description: High-ranking manager in a megacorporation wielding significant power and resources. Lives in luxury towers while orchestrating global business operations and crushing competition.

background.name: Wage Slave
background.description: Middle-management corporate employee trapped in endless bureaucracy and debt. Works grueling hours in sterile office complexes while dreaming of escape from the corporate machine.

background.name: Street Samurai
background.description: Cybernetically enhanced warrior-for-hire operating in the urban shadows. Combines traditional martial codes with cutting-edge augmentations and high-tech weapons.

background.name: Netrunner
background.description: Elite hacker who jacks into cyberspace to steal data and infiltrate corporate systems. Lives on the edge between virtual and physical reality with neural interface implants.

background.name: Corpo Spy
background.description: Corporate intelligence operative specializing in industrial espionage and sabotage. Maintains multiple identities while gathering secrets for megacorp masters.

background.name: Street Gang Member
background.description: Territorial fighter from the urban underbelly controlling neighborhoods through violence and intimidation. Survives by dealing drugs, weapons, and illegal cyberware.

background.name: Cyberdoc
background.description: Underground physician specializing in cybernetic implant installation and black market surgery. Operates illegal clinics for those who can't afford corporate medical care.

background.name: Techno-Shaman
background.description: Mystic who blends ancient spiritual practices with digital consciousness exploration. Believes technology and spirituality are interconnected paths to transcendence.

background.name: Corpo Security
background.description: Armed guard protecting corporate assets and executives from threats. Heavily augmented with combat implants and loyalty conditioning protocols.

background.name: Data Courier
background.description: Professional smuggler who transports sensitive information using encrypted neural storage. Maintains strict neutrality while carrying corporate and criminal data.

background.name: Rockerboy/Rockergirl
background.description: Rebellious musician using art to spread anti-corporate messages and inspire social change. Performs in underground venues while dodging corporate censorship.

background.name: Fixer
background.description: Underground broker who connects clients with specialists for illegal jobs. Maintains extensive networks of contacts in both criminal and corporate worlds.

background.name: Media Personality
background.description: Investigative journalist or entertainer with access to information networks. Risks everything to expose corporate corruption and government conspiracies.

background.name: Nomad Wanderer
background.description: Member of mobile tribe living outside city limits in the wasteland. Maintains independence from corporate control while scavenging and trading.

background.name: AI Researcher
background.description: Scientist studying artificial intelligence and digital consciousness. Works on the bleeding edge of technology while questioning the nature of sentience.

background.name: Biomod Dealer
background.description: Black market merchant specializing in biological and cybernetic enhancements. Provides illegal augmentations to those seeking to transcend human limitations.

background.name: Corporate Assassin
background.description: Professional killer employed by megacorporations to eliminate threats and competitors. Uses advanced stealth technology and exotic weapons.

background.name: Slum Dweller
background.description: Survivor from the overcrowded urban sprawl living in poverty and squalor. Struggles daily for basic necessities while avoiding corporate exploitation.

background.name: Cyberpunk Hacker
background.description: Anarchist programmer fighting corporate control through digital rebellion. Creates viruses and backdoors to disrupt the system from within.

background.name: Military Veteran
background.description: Former soldier from corporate wars now struggling to adapt to civilian life. Carries physical and psychological scars from battles fought for profit.

background.name: Underground Racer
background.description: High-speed driver competing in illegal street races through dangerous urban environments. Modifies vehicles with cutting-edge technology and contraband parts.

background.name: Virtual Reality Addict
background.description: Individual completely absorbed in digital worlds and online experiences. Struggles with reality addiction while living primarily in virtual spaces.

background.name: Corporate Scientist
background.description: Researcher working on experimental technology for megacorporation advancement. Develops new weapons, drugs, and augmentations regardless of ethical concerns.

background.name: Street Preacher
background.description: Religious zealot spreading spiritual messages in urban decay. Offers hope and salvation to the downtrodden while opposing corporate materialism.

background.name: Augmented Athlete
background.description: Professional sports competitor enhanced with cybernetic implants for superhuman performance. Competes in extreme sports leagues for corporate entertainment.

background.name: Black Market Trader
background.description: Merchant dealing in illegal goods and contraband technology. Operates from hidden markets while avoiding corporate law enforcement.

background.name: Memory Thief
background.description: Specialist who extracts and manipulates human memories using advanced neurotechnology. Works for corporations, criminals, and private clients.

background.name: Corporate Whistleblower
background.description: Former insider who exposed megacorporation crimes and now lives in hiding. Constantly evades assassination attempts while fighting for justice.

background.name: Cybernetic Monk
background.description: Ascetic who embraces technology as a path to spiritual enlightenment. Seeks perfect fusion of flesh and machine while maintaining philosophical detachment.

background.name: Drone Operator
background.description: Remote pilot controlling robotic units for surveillance, combat, or labor. Operates multiple mechanical bodies while remaining physically safe.

background.name: Scream Sheet Editor
background.description: Sensationalist news publisher spreading rumors, scandals, and conspiracy theories. Operates underground media networks beyond corporate censorship.

background.name: Corpo Lawyer
background.description: Legal advocate specializing in corporate law and contract negotiation. Helps megacorporations circumvent regulations while crushing opposition.

background.name: Synthetic Human
background.description: Artificially created being struggling with questions of identity and purpose. Possesses human-like consciousness but faces prejudice and exploitation.

background.name: Underground Doctor
background.description: Medical professional providing healthcare to those rejected by corporate medical systems. Operates illegal clinics in the slums and undercity.

background.name: Data Miner
background.description: Information specialist who extracts valuable data from digital sources and human minds. Sells intelligence to the highest bidder regardless of consequences.

background.name: Corporate Heir
background.description: Privileged offspring of megacorp dynasty groomed for leadership but potentially rebellious. Enjoys vast resources while questioning family legacy.

background.name: Street Shaman
background.description: Urban mystic who combines ancient wisdom with modern technology. Provides spiritual guidance to street communities while resisting corporate oppression.

background.name: Bounty Hunter
background.description: Licensed tracker who captures criminals and corporate fugitives for reward money. Uses advanced surveillance technology and lethal force.

background.name: Corpo Janitor
background.description: Maintenance worker with access to corporate secrets through cleaning duties. Often overlooked but potentially valuable as an inside source.

background.name: Resistance Fighter
background.description: Dedicated revolutionary working to overthrow corporate control and government oppression. Uses guerrilla tactics and underground networks.
